metadata.description: Claude Code plugins by shihwesley — codebase mapping, documentation, research sandboxes, reverse engineering, environment management, and developer productivity tools

plugins.name: chronicler
plugins.description: Ambient .tech.md generation — auto-documents and tracks freshness of your codebase

plugins.name: mercator-ai
plugins.description: Merkle-enhanced codebase mapping for AI agents. O(1) change detection, parallel subagent analysis.

plugins.name: rlm-sandbox
plugins.description: Docker sandbox for Python/DSPy execution with memvid-backed knowledge store. 16 MCP tools for code execution, sub-agents, session persistence, and research automation.

plugins.name: code-simplifier-tldr
plugins.description: TLDR-aware code simplifier — uses AST summaries for context, full reads only for target files. 80%+ token savings on large codebases. Merkle-integrated for O(1) change detection when used with mercator-ai.

plugins.name: interactive-planning
plugins.description: Manus-style file-based planning with interactive gates and native task tracking. Supports task-based and spec-driven modes.

plugins.name: agent-reverse
plugins.description: Reverse engineer and extract capabilities from any source — repos, configs, binaries, articles — into your agent workflow. Security scanning, manifest tracking, cross-agent restore.

plugins.name: orbit
plugins.description: Ambient dev environment management — auto-switches between dev, test, staging, and prod using Docker containers, sidecars, and task-aware classification.
